abstract: Sanofi-Aventis has made a formal $2.02 billion offer to buy the rest of Zentiva, challenging PPF Group‘s bid for the Czech drugmaker, Bloomberg reported.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis has made a formal $2.02 billion offer to buy the rest of Zentiva, challenging PPF Group‘s bid for the Czech drugmaker, Bloomberg reported.

headline.main: Sanofi Makes Official Bid for Zentiva
